channel.title: (New faction suggestion!) 7 New Classes! No converting!
channel.description:
**_Name - absorber _** **_Faction -neutral(evil)_** **_Type - offense_**
**Day Ability 1** - true power - absorb a players ability, being able to use their unlimited night ability as your night 2 Ability tonight.(unlimited uses)
**Day Ability 1** - New body - jump into another players body becoming them. Your previous body will die with the last class you absorbed, if you didn't absorb any abilities then you will appear as the absorber when you die.(similar to possessor)(1 use)
Example: night 1 you absorbed a butlers power, being able to use wine tonight. Then you decide to switch body the next day. Your previous body will show as butler because that's who you last absorbed
**Night ability 1** - our secret matters - talk to the third eye member tonight.(2 uses)
**Win condition** - survive to see the BD fall
_**Name - third eye leader **_ _**Faction - third eye **_ _**Type - special**_
**Passive 1** - will show as BD to the detective for the first 3 nights
**Day Ability 1** - secret matters - keep whispers between the third eye and the absorber secret(4 uses)
**Night ability 1** - hidden potential - determine a players class type(unlimited uses)
**Night ability 2** - true sacrifice - kill a player tonight (unlimited uses)
**Win condition** - kill all who opposes the third eye
_**Name - Vengeful eye(needs better name) **_ _**Faction - third eye**_ _**Type - offense**_
**Day Ability 1** - deep cut - make a player bleed. It will say that they have 2 day before they die(like normal) but they will only have 1 day to be healed.(similar to butlers poison). (1 use)
**Day Ability 2** - stolen poison - poison someone, they will die in two days unless healed. (3 uses)
**Night ability 1** - admire - have a player admire them self, occupying them for that night (unlimited uses)
**Night ability 2** - switched - select a player and a class. When that player does then they will appeared as that class (2 uses)
**Win condition** - kill all who opposes the third eye
**_Name - golden eye(need better name)_** **_Faction - third eye _** **_Type - invest_**
**Passive 1** - all seeing - will know who visits you
**Day Ability 1** - a good view - see a chat tonight from either the prince or psychic (2 uses)
**Night ability 1** - magical visions - determain if a player is a magic user(unlimited uses)
**Night ability 2** - determain a players class type down the two options(unlimited uses)
**Win condition**- kill anyone who opposes the third eye
**_Name - protector(needs better name)_** **_Faction - third eye_** **_Type - support_**
**Passive 1** - close relationships - if a mercy needs a contract then you will be contracted instantly. The merc will know of this and why (you were forced to contract _players_ _name_ do to close relationships)
**Night ability 1** - friendly backstaber - attack a player and heal them (3 uses)
**Night ability 2** - extra cash - send a merc to guard a player(unlimited uses)
**Win condition** - kill all who opposes the third eye
**_Name - the disturber (needs better name)_** **_Faction - third eye_** **_Type - social_**
**Day ability 1** - Going insane - make someone crazy having them hear people talk but they wont know who is talking, everyone will appear as anonymous, this includes whispers. (4 uses)
**Day ability 2** - in your head - select two players. The first player will send the message and the second player will revive it. After selecting two players then a box will show up where you can type a whisper and it will appear as the first player is whispering to the second. (Unlimited uses)
**Night ability 1** - crawling my way inside - select a player and then select one of the false info you want to place in their mind (unlimited uses) - you were attacked and healed - you were occupied - a hunter has attacked you - a mercanary has stood guard at your door - any other messages during the night that I did not mention
**Night ability 2** - I’m not real - select a player, any night action that will be performed on you will be switched to selected player. The player will also be framed that night making them appear as unseen/cult or killer/offense depending on who investages them(4 uses)
**Win condition** - survive To see the BD fall
_**Name - The detective (needs better name)**_ _**Faction - BD**_ _**Type - invest **_ _**(Only spawns in third eye games)**_
**Passive 1** - little hope - if no one dies when you wake up then you will be death immune that night.
**Day Ability 1** - personal maid - see whispers from your selected player (4 uses)
**Night ability 1** - sixth sense - determain if a player is apart of the third eye (unlimited uses)
**Win condition** - kill all who opposes the BD
**Mechanics**(**please read**) - the third eye leader and absorber will always spawn in third eye games. If the third eye leader dies then a new member will take his place. There will be 2 other members of the third eye plus the third eye leader that will spawn in the game
This took me a couple days to make with rethinking some abilities and trying to make each class balanced. Still need some help with the names. If you haven't noticed, this faction can't convert like the rest. So I tried to make it balanced between all classes. Please comment and tell me what you think and if this would fit.
